meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7544.

td.p: Coby Klein, a PhD candidate in biology from Huntington, New York
Christie Burke, a school librarian from Richfield, Minnesota
Joe Nguyen, an attorney from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,200)

tr.td: HOPE-POURRI
BEASTLY VERBS
BIBLE STUDY
WHAT'S THE SCORE?
CHINESE CUISINE
THIS IS 40

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
